data.text: @CuriePeach @ScienceUpFirst I hope you got the link. Sometimes Twitter deleted them.
@BarelyBook @ScienceUpFirst exact link to this page please

@ScienceUpFirst Thank you. So why are governments like Ontario lifting all measures all at once? When some ~ 50% of eligible are not boosted!
Also , there is no official recommendations for next shots 4th/ 2nd boosters in future? Plus accessible antiviral drugs?

@ScienceUpFirst @CPHO_Canada @GovCanHealth @OttawaHealth @CIHR_IRSC @CASC_ACCS @CaulfieldTim @StanKutcher @thisisourshotca @heysciencesam COVID isn't over like malaria and influenza are not over, but, as a society, I'm pretty sure it is over. We have learned that we have the tools to treat COVID but really can't control its spread. Thus, to me, it's over. Let people move on with their lives and start making choices
@ScienceUpFirst If the vaccines and masks donâ€™t slow the spread, how would more vaccinations reduce a new variant?

@ScienceUpFirst @CPHO_Canada @GovCanHealth @OttawaHealth @CIHR_IRSC @CASC_ACCS @CaulfieldTim @StanKutcher @thisisourshotca @heysciencesam This is what our governments aren't understanding. It isn't over. We should be relaxing not removing the protocols. There are still many at risk. Giving into the complaints at the cost do lives.
